name: 5Nights no Obieru Koro ni TSUNAGI
description:
Salutations, VMSoft here.

This game is a horror kinetic visual novel based on Five Nights at Freddy's and partially Higurashi no Naku Koro ni, developed and published by VMSoft.

Made in the Ren'PY Visual Novel Engine.

PLEASE NOTE: This game is not a full version. The full version will have improved backgrounds and character sprites, improved and more scenarios, and additional content.

NEW ADDITION: Unlike previous releases, this game has an official English translation.
